A review article could be a good idea but the problem is that the subject m=
atter is not very scientific.  It's more practical/technical.  That's why I=
 have felt like it won't necessarily make that great of a research publicat=
ion.  At the same time, like you say, it's important stuff to consider  if =
someone is really going to design one of these systems, so in principle the=
re should be a place to share it.  Maybe we can talk more about the idea of=
 such an article at the symposium.

ken
